Name: Inspire Loyalty
Description: True Loyalty comes from respect. Inspire your followers so they understand that you are worthy of it.

Name: Rally
Description: A well-timed rally from a capable leader can turn the tide of battle as much as a well-thought plan.

Name: Lure
Description: Just a piece of bait. Even the mightiest can fall to the weakest in the right circumstance.

Name: Misinformation
Description: The right plan and action can only be implemented with the right information. One wrong placement of a piece can render the whole operation crumble.

Name: Order Disruption
Description: Any organisation cannot exist without order. A small disruption in the chain of command is enough to open a window to a total collapse.

Name: Majestic Presence
Description: Appearance is everything. No one respects those who look inferior to themselves. A majestic appearance befitting of a great leader will surely bring awe to all who follow you.

Name: Forced March
Description: Location is a deciding factor in most battles. A forced march may ensure that you can secure an advantageous position before the enemy.

Name: Death March
Description: Deaths are preferable to defeat. The commander orders, and the troops obey such is the will of an army. One final march.

Name: Suppress Fear
Description: Soldiers quivering in fear is no better than unarmed civilians. What use is their weapon if they are not going to wield it against their enemies?

Name: Determination
Description: Only willpower brings a dream to reality. Determination begets success or so the saying goes.

Name: Encourage
Description: A simple encouragement can go a long way to make the weak become the strong.

Name: Make Haste
Description: Speed is half the battle. Securing the location, reinforcing allies or flanking enemies. All require speed to be effectively accomplished.

Name: Demoralise
Description: Morale is everything in battle. A battle can only go on when the troops are willing to fight. Now just take that out of the equation and a fight will turn into a massacre.

Name: Show Of Force
Description: A simple demonstration of true power. They only need to see to know defeat. The ultimate feat of victory to win a war without waging a single battle .

Name: Tactical Withdrawal
Description: A quick and efficient retreat is a tactic every good leader must know. Why waste your troops on a losing battle when a winning one is possible later on?

Name: Defense Focus
Description: The best defence is a good offence. Receive, gauge, and then retaliate. Let the enemy makes the first move allows you to select the best countermeasure.

Name: Range Focus
Description: The ultimate point of warfare is to win with minimal loss. Superior firing range and power can help accomplish that.

Name: Ambush Focus
Description: The enemy one should fight with is the enemy unprepared for battle. No one can really efficiently plan against an unseen enemy.

Name: Swift Retreat
Description: Running away and conserving your troops to save the day. This is the way to win the war.

Name: Divine Purity
Description: Purity of the soul and mind reaching the status of divinity. No mere man can hope to accomplish such a feat.

Name: Conqueror's Destiny
Description: The star aligns, and it is time for the dynasty to change. Some say the ruler's throne has a will of its own, and it will choose only those who deserve of it. No one can deny destiny. Not even the conqueror himself.

Name: Land Supremacy
Description: Complete control over land is now established under the supreme leadership. The battle is simply as good as over.

Name: Commence The Hunt
Description: The hunting party is commenced. All are nothing more than prey in the eyes of true hunters.

Name: Liberty Or Death
Description: Liberty or death! The spirit of revolution and rebellion throughout history against the oppressors never truly die.

Name: Demon Curse
Description: Some curses are worse than death. This one is definitely one of those.

Name: Bribery Betrayal
Description: No man can resist the temptation of wealth when they can grasp it. Loyalty can be bought with the right amount of bribe.

Name: Absolute Might
Description: Only those with might can truly rule. The strongs not only survive, they can exploit, dominate, and eradicate the weaks at will.

Name: Finest Archer
Description: One arrow is enough to win the battle when it reaches the right place.

Name: Will Domination
Description: All will can crumble. A simple trick to the mind and even the strongest of will shall fall to the string of manipulation.

Name: Abandon All Hope
Description: Abandon everything. You must flee and survive at any cost.
